title: Covid: Travel firms angry over France quarantine rule
content:
1. Covid: Travel firms angry over France quarantine rule  BBC News
  2. UK maintains quarantine obligation for vaccinated travellers coming from France • FRANCE 24  FRANCE 24 English
  3. U.I to Require Travelers From France to Quarantine Over Beta Variant Fears  The New York Times
  4. BREAKING: Double-jabbed arrivals from France must still quarantine from 19 July  Sky News
  5. Travelers Fume at UK Move to Keep Restrictions on France  U.S. News & World Report
